definitions.text: a female person who has the same parents as another person
(Roman Catholic Church) a title given to a nun (and used as a form of address)
examples: the Sisters taught her to love God

definitions.text: a female person who is a fellow member of a sorority or labor union or other group
examples: none of her sisters would betray her

definitions.text: (slang) sometimes used as a term of address for attractive young women
